category: Election Fair Commission Regulations/Article 12 (Exclusion and Avoidance)
contents: Article 12 (Exclusion and Avoidance) ① The chairperson, vice-chairperson and members shall not be involved in the decision-making of the Fair Election Commission in the following cases. 1. When the subject of deliberation is a relative (referring to a relative under Article 777 of the Civil Act) 2. When discussing an issue that has direct interest to the member himself or herself 3. When there are other valid reasons for not being fair ② If the chairperson, vice-chairperson, or member falls under paragraph (1), he/she must voluntarily avoid deliberation on the relevant agenda.
